title: Adam Scott | Trump Dangles Pardons for Jan. 6 Defendants After Blockbuster Hearings: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump suggesting he might pardon the January 6 defendants if he gets re-elected in 2024 as the committee investigating the coup attempt continues to reveal new evidence of his coordinated, criminal plot to overthrow American democracy.

Then, Adam Scott talks about the last-second Father's Day gift from his kids, his son coding a computer program for him that only says "Adam is a penis" and what his kids think of Parks and Rec.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
